choiceresponse.p: In Trainingland, select a facility level organisation unit, data set and a period of your choice in the Data Entry app. Click into one of the data fields.

label.h3: What information does the Metadata Information Pop-up include?

checkboxgroup.choice: The specific data element (and the disaggregation if applicable) you are entering data into

div.p: The Metadata Information Pop-up, available in the upper right-hand corner of the Data Entry app, includes information about the organisation unit, period and the specific data element (and the disaggregation if applicable) you are entering data into.
